description: If you're a huge Buffalo hockey fan, this is the app for you!  Buffalo Hockey Fans provides you with access to the latest news, videos, stats, schedule, standings and scores. You'll always know what's happening with the team!   You can also discuss the latest news and highlights with other Buffalo fans using the built in chat feature. Make sure your voice is heard!   There is no better or more comprehensive tool to stay up to date with Buffalo. If you are a true fan, you owe it to yourself to download Buffalo Hockey Fans today!    ** Brighthouse Labs and the Buffalo Hockey Fans application are in no way associated with the NHL or the Buffalo Sabres. All trademarks are owned by their respective owners.
